Kappa Sutta：1．Kappa Sutta．-Two suttas where Kappa Thera - see Kappa （3） - asks the Buddha how it is possible to get rid of thoughts of ”I” and ”mine，” and to have conceit regarding the body utterly destroyed．S．iii．169f．； see also S．ii．253f．



2．Kappa Sutta．-On the four incalculable periods of the aeon （kappa）：when it rolls up，stands still，rolls out，and remains in that condition．A．ii．142； cf．D．i．14； 109； Mil．232．
